document.full_text: the valedictorian of a high school in a san antonio suburb where a judge has banned formal prayers at graduation ceremonies on saturday is fighting for an opportunity to lead the crowd in prayer.
document.title: valedictorian fights judge's ban on graduation prayer
lines_and_colors: the valedictorian of a high school in a san antonio suburb where a judge has banned formal prayers at graduation ceremonies on saturday is fighting for an opportunity to lead the crowd in prayer.
